reviews.sentence: Hotel could use some updates. Could use some updates furniture outdated old and stained. Pool was out of order the entire week we were there. Locations was good shower pressure was excellent. Plenty of places to eat. Updating.

Hotel could use some updates. Could use some updates furniture outdated old and stained. Pool was out of order the entire week we were there. Locations was good shower pressure was excellent. Plenty of places to eat. Updating.

its was just okay not what I expected. They offer s sleep number bed which in the room we were in it needed a new one. Very uncomfortable. This facility is in the process of being remodeled and the pool is closed it would have been nice to know before I booked. Hopefully they will be remodeling the rooms as they are a little outdated. We had a problem with our room key not working. They had to replace mine 4 times and I finally gave up and my husbands had to be replaced twice. They told me that I can not keep it by my other cards because it would deactivate it. I explained that it was not by any cards and I kept it separate. It was not an awful place to stay but I do not think i would go back there. And breakfast is not included. It was an extra charge.

Needs a remodled for sure. We traveled here for a Wedding and stayed for 2 nights. The Sleep number beds they have are terrible. We did not have a good nights sleep because they were so uncomfortable. Our room was offered as a Suite but it was tiny and only 1 nice Chair to sit in and the other was an office Chair. The whole hotel on the inside needs some upkeep to make it looks nice. I will say that they Staff working were very nice and very helpful. It did concern us that one poor young lady worked in the morning in the Breakfast area and then we saw her doing Room Service deliveries also and then when we left for the Wedding she was working the front desk and when we arrived back late that night she was still working the front desk. I do not remember her name but she needs a Raise for working so hard.

My room a single king was large and comfortable a separate living area that could be closed off from the bedroom. Close to the pool. Pool is inside a courtyard area and safe from vagrants. Hotel staff is very accommodating and had no problem allowing me a late check out. Close to decent restaurants and shopping as well as I10 and Sky Harbor. The pool area is quite nice with chairs and towels provided. The in room furnishings could be updated. The couch in my room had stains wear marks on the cushions.

Room was ok bathroom renovated carpet was dirty AC extremely LOUD Smoke alarm detector was covered with plastic Phone DEAD not able to contact Front desk to notify also woke up to a burning smell turns out the Bathroom light had electrical fireflames. there was smoke in the bathroom since the phone did not work I walked down to front desk notified staff who did not seem to care contacted maintenance. I had my family abruptly woken up dressed and out the door. Went to check out and a different staff member who heard my experience again apologized and tried to make it up. staff member wrote notes since the first staff member did not do anything offered free breakfast to us but at that time all we wanted to do was to leave just the thought of how uncaring they where when I showed the pictures I took with my phone that changed right away. needless to say I will never stay there again as convenient as it is to us the experience was BAD.

Failure to disclose refurbishment by hotelscom. Hotelscom did not post that this hotel was under refurbishment of 3 of the four floors. If we had known then we would have expected some inconveniences. The worst was a jackhammer sounding noise from a faulty AC unit from room next door. Front desk accommodated us in another room when could not sleep. Then we had to move rooms the next day.
Did n’t like how much renovation was in process made it difficult.

Horrible Experience. Do not believe the TripAdvisor photos as they are dated. This hotel charged us the full rate for a place that is a total construction zone. There is NO pool lobby restaraunt or any common areas. The room we had was remodeled but not complete TV broken door seal messed up lighting that did not work exposed wires etc. The limited hotel staff was obviously trying to operate under the bad conditions and was very combative. Very bad experience for my family but other descent hotels are booked for spring training.
I like this property and ca n’t wait till the renovations are finished.
Hotel is under renovations so almost everything is brand new nice and clean. Bad thing that the bar lounge and pool were not open.

Not 100 Ready but Has Potential. Since this is a new hotel and only 1 review I will be even a little more detailed than usual. It was a Radison years ago then independent and now it is DoubleTree I think since August 2019. The renovation is very nice pool room bathroom shower only in mine bar gym conference rooms common area. The strange thing is the air conditioning vents and panels are still rusted and not fully closed in the hallway and in the room. Some of the window door glasses are still kind of dirty. Stair cases are outside. Housekeeping is the biggest issue I experienced. When I got to my room the toilet seat was down usually they are either closed completely or up. When I flipped it up there was a urine stain on the bottom of the seat toward the front. The toilet paper was not folded like hotels usually do. The tissue paper was already showing blue almost finished. The bag with the hair dryer was dirty. There was also some stains on the sofa. So housekeeping really needs to improve. On the subject of facial tissues it is the cheap kind that falls apart as you use it DoubleTrees should use better quality tissues than that. Service was kind of uneven. I called before arrival to see if they can help me choose a better room. The person who answered the phone said every room is good and did not seem to want to help. Upon arrival the front desk offered me an upgrade me to a suite without me asking because of my Diamond status. Except for that employee who was not very patient or extra friendly I also interacted with her at the hotel every other employee I encountered was nice and want to go the extra mile for guests at their new hotel. The hotel is L shaped. Part of it is right next to the I10 exit ramp. Then there is also the hot Arizona sun to consider. Somehow the Hilton Ap did not show a map of the rooms. The even numbered rooms face inside the L and the pool. I had a room that faces the pool and the noise from people at the pool does travel up. Could not hear the freeway traffic so that is good. Breakfast is kind of fast casual buffet style supposedly the new DoubleTree Made Market concept. Food quality is decent comparable to other DoubleTrees and price is reasonable 1295 adult 5 kids for full buffet. There is also a nice bar in the lobby. No lounge for Diamonds very few DoubleTrees doThe location is kind of out of the way for Phoenix Tempe Scotsdale. There are quite a few stores in strip malls on the other side of I10.

Wow high end reno. So clean and new peaceful quiet room 123. No problem with getting cold AC actually we set it too low and had to raise the thermostat. mind you it ’s in the 100 ’s temperature in Phoenix right now. Always drink bottled water in Arizona tap tastes horrible. no matter where you stay and as a Gold member my husband I were given 2 on arrival along with 2 freshly baked chocolate chip cookies. We requested more in room coffee packets and staff brought it right away to our room. Front desk help were cheerful and seemed to enjoy their job. also same in the restaurant area. Breakfast was good no evidence of pest control guys in the kitchen for our stay. But unlike the one reviewer who did not like spotting him leaving the kitchen area I would of felt reassured that they were doing what is necessary to keep bugs and pests away. Come to my house. I have my kitchen done by pest control too. The decor is high end resort quality. Speakman showerheads non slip shower with heavy glass doors Crabtre Evelyn toiletries plenty of plush white towels high end quartz countertops LED lighted mirrors LED lighting floor lamps wall bedside and table lamps at every area also numerous charging outlets luxury porcelain and vinyl plank marble tiling accents. Great front entrance inside bar area expansive pool area and well equipped gym. I seriously considered canceling my Airport Hilton hotel return reservation just to be able to stay another night at this hotel but unfortunately they do n’t have an Airport shuttle too far from. If this hotel is able to maintain and keep up this nice property I ’l stay here again when next in the Phoenix area.

Clean newly renovated unknown option for Phoenix travelers. As a last minute attempt to find room in Phoenix during a big convention this Doubletree was listed as 15 minutes south from the airport. This newly renovated hotel was clean fresh with an incredible staff. All were so friendly and helpful. There are good restaurants nearby in an upscale mall and I highly recommend. Breakfast and accommodations were A one.

Clean newly renovated unknown option for Phoenix travelers. As a last minute attempt to find room in Phoenix during a big convention this Doubletree was listed as 15 minutes south from the airport. This newly renovated hotel was clean fresh with an incredible staff. All were so friendly and helpful. There are good restaurants nearby in an upscale mall and I highly recommend. Breakfast and accommodations were A one.

Great value and newly remodeled. Hotel is a good area close to everything Phoenix has to offer. Staff is excellent and friendly. Hotel is newly remodeled with a great bar and breakfast area. Rooms are modern and the pool area is super nice with outside seating area from the bar area. Good place to stay on business or when having fun in the city.

Great value and newly remodeled. Hotel is a good area close to everything Phoenix has to offer. Staff is excellent and friendly. Hotel is newly remodeled with a great bar and breakfast area. Rooms are modern and the pool area is super nice with outside seating area from the bar area. Good place to stay on business or when having fun in the city.
Comfy beds very clean eating area downstairs Newly renovated property.

Newly renovated hotel. Crisp clean and newly renovated. A great place to stay. Staff was friendly and acomodating. Housekeeping was efecient and prepared rooms to a high standard. Great location near I10 and restaurants and retail stores.
